description: Create an action item key result link
permissions: User must be authorized to create via ActionItemKeyResultPolicy (delegated to KeyResultPolicy), which requires access to the related key result (and its objective when present).
side_effects: Creates a new action item key result link between an action item and a key result.
validation_notes: Requires --action-item and --key-result (non-empty). Action item and key result must belong to the same broker. The action_item_id must be unique within the key_result_id. Action item and key result relationships are create-only.
